description: The public organization seeks a supplier for aviation fuel under a national master standing order. These requests will be fulfilled in accordance with CGSB standards. The fuel is to be delivered to various locations in Canada. The tender includes environmentally preferred packaging.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## E60HL-230052-F Bulk Aviation Fuel 2023-2025

### Background

A competitive bidding process will be conducted by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of their end-user department, to purchase bulk aviation fuel for a 2-year period from 2023 to 2025.

### Scope of Work

The procurement scope includes the supply of bulk aviation fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards, with delivery to various locations across Canada on an as-and-when-requested basis.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Type**: Competitive Bidding
* **Procurement Method**: Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

### Regions of Delivery

Delivery is required to various locations across Canada, including:

* Prince Edward Island
* Saskatchewan
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* British Columbia
* Alberta
* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Nova Scotia
* Quebec (except NCR)
* Northwest Territories
* Ontario (except NCR)
* New Brunswick
* Manitoba
* Canada

### Contact Information

Pam Munz
PSPC
Phone: (insert phone number)
Email: [pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Documents

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted in accordance with the terms and conditions specified in the [tender package](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19953215?extsite=MTk5NTMyMTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: June 7, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 8, 2024 at 2:00 pm EDT (claims submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: [To be determined]
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Per
